20101219163633.250|20101219163634.500|CCO|YOU WANT TO RESPOND?
20101219163634.500|20101219163635.750|CCO|>> I THINK WHAT DAMAGES OUR
20101219163635.750|20101219163637.000|CCO|NATIONAL SECURITY IS TO SIGN A
